title: Dubai on Schedule to Deliver a Slew of Luxury Homes Before Expo 2020
text:
With the Dubai 2020 World Expo around the corner, there have been a number of prime and super-prime developments that have come to the market to fulfill the city’s demand for high-end projects.

In addition to visitors for the world fair, which is expected to bring 25 million to the city, the Dubai real estate market is hoping to gain another boost from those who come post-expo, attracted by what they experienced during the event.

“I believe the post-expo impact on the luxury real estate market in Dubai will be far greater than it is now,” said Michelle Liddiard, luxury sales specialist at Luxhabitat.

“Once the visitors for the Expo visit the city, they will want to come back, which will enhance the property market,” Ms. Liddiard said.

As the city gears for its visitors, some high-end residential projects in Dubai have recently launched sales.

Below are some luxury projects that will start hand-over before Expo 2020.
description: The city skyline unveils new additions designed with the international fair in mind
